QuestData.Title: Stay a While
QuestData.Description: <The old dwarf doesn't react to your presence as you approach. As he gazes over the landscape, a deep frown is set in his face. It's a pleasant view. It might be nice to take a break and watch the landscape.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Sit for a while. Look at the landscape.
QuestData.RewardText: or listening to me Young One, I appreciated it more

Objectives.Objective: Sit and look at the view
